ScenarioDef.label: Banished
ScenarioDef.description: A stranded survivor with very enigmatic origins tries to escape a rimworld. There is nothing to help him in this endeavour, but his own abilities. The true testament of any rimworld survivor. \n\nTrue hardcore scenario. You will play as a human.

scenario.summary: An enigmatic survivor tries to escape from a hostile world, with nothing but his wits to help him.

li.text:
Your reasons for being here are a mystery to anyone but yourself. Maybe it was something you did to someone. Maybe you pushed your luck too hard. Whatever the cause, you must have left in a great hurry, considering you didn't bring any supplies with you. You receive a transmission on your radio, a familiar voice speaks to you:

"I managed to sneak you out of there, but you need to leave this world ASAP. I wish i could do more for you, but i need to get back before they realize i'm missing or they'll know it was me who helped you escape. Best of luck." 

You'll need a spaceship to get off the planet, but right now you better set up a camp in order to survive.
